site_title: Pātaka Matihiko o Te Wai Kāre
site_subtitle: Te tiaki i te ahurea me te taiao o Te Wai Kāre
site_description: He rauemi pātaka matihiko utu kore e whakamahi ana i ngā mahere me ngā ihirangi hangaia e te kaiwhakamahi hei whakauru i te hītori, te mātai matawhenua, me te hangarau matihiko. Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi te uru ki ngā raraunga taiao, ngā kōrero ahurea, me ngā mōhiohio hītori mō Te Wai Kāre, ā, ka taea hoki te tāpiri i ō rātou ake mōhiohio hei hanga i tētahi pātaka whānui o ngā taonga tuku iho o te roto.
explore_themes: Torotoro i ngā kaupapa puta noa i te Pātaka Matihiko o Te Wai Kāre.
flora_fauna: Ngā Tipu me ngā Kararehe o te Rohe
records_description: Ko ngā rēkoata te manawa o tō mātou pātaka matihiko, me ia pine e tohu ana i tētahi kōrero, mea hītori, raraunga taiao, mahi ahurea rānei e pā ana ki Te Wai Kāre. Ka taea e ia rēkoata te kuhu i ngā whakaahua, oro mai i ngā kaumātua o te hapori, ataata, me ngā tuhinga e tuhi ana i ngā taonga tuku iho o te roto.
browse_records: Torotoro i ngā rēkoata i runga i te mahere
discover_stories: Kimihia ngā kōrero me ngā raraunga puta noa i te whenua o Te Wai Kāre
collections_description: Ka whakarōpū ngā kohinga i ngā rēkoata mā ngā kaupapa pērā i te 'Wātaka Kounga Wai', 'Taonga Tuku Iho Māori', 'Ngā Kaupapa Whakaora i ngā Repo' rānei. Ka kōrero ēnei rōpū whakarōpū i ngā kōrero whānui mō ngā wā o mua, o nāianei, me ngā wā e tū mai nei o Te Wai Kāre mā ngā rēkoata maha e hono ana.
explore_collections: Torotoro i ngā kohinga kaupapa e kōrero ana i ngā kōrero o Te Wai Kāre
map_overlays_description: Ka whakaatu ā mātou papanga mahere ātaata i te huringa o Te Wai Kāre i te wā. Tirohia ngā whakaahua rangi o mua, ngā mahere whakamahi whenua, ngā mahere hōhonu, me ngā whakaaturanga raraunga taiao. Ka taea te huri i waenga i te tirohanga pūmārō me tō mātou momo whakaahua mō ngā tamariki.
visualize_changes: Whakaatu i ngā huringa i te wā mā ngā papanga mahere ātaata
made_with_love: Hangaia me te aroha e te Rōpū 10
copyright: © {{year}} Pātaka Matihiko o Te Wai Kāre. Ko ngā mana katoa e mau ana.
